## Bio

My name is Tony Henry Oduor, I hail from the beautiful landscapes of Kenya, East Africa.

I have a wealth of experience managing and analysing healthcare data for decision-making.

I'm passionate about reproducible research, automating data products, statistical computing, and data visualization.
